shr.core

Element TerminationReason

Documentation:

A code explaining unplanned or premature termination of a plan of treatment, course of medication, or research study.

Ancestors:
  • TerminationReason
Used By:
  • CancerRelatedRadiationProcedure, 
  • MedicationStatement, 
  • RadiationProcedure, 
  • ResearchStudy, 
  • ResearchSubject
